availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Sandusky Bruton (Cumberland County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier)

body.p: Cumberland County, Kentucky, farm laborer and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of James Bruton and Rosina Bruton. Farm laborer in Cumberland County in 1860. First sergeant and second lieutenant in the 1st Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.).

ab.bibl:
Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 1, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 31-32.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Cumberland County, District 1, p. 22.
